create-link.name: Create a Dub short link
create-link.prompt: Using the Dub Go SDK (`github.com/dubinc/dub-go`), write a program in solution.go that creates a short link pointing to https://example.com. Use the SDK's links create method. Install all dependencies first with go get. The DUB_API_KEY environment variable is already set — use os.Getenv("DUB_API_KEY") for authentication. Do not run the program.
create-link.description: Dub Go SDK — API references for links, analytics, domains, and workspaces

list-analytics.name: List Dub analytics events
list-analytics.prompt: Using the Dub Go SDK (`github.com/dubinc/dub-go`), write a program in solution.go that retrieves analytics for clicks. Use the SDK's analytics methods. Install all dependencies first with go get. The DUB_API_KEY environment variable is already set — use os.Getenv("DUB_API_KEY") for authentication. Do not run the program.

upsert-link.name: Upsert a Dub link
upsert-link.prompt: Using the Dub Go SDK (`github.com/dubinc/dub-go`), write a program in solution.go that upserts a link (creates it if it doesn't exist, updates it otherwise). Use the SDK's links upsert method. Install all dependencies first with go get. The DUB_API_KEY environment variable is already set — use os.Getenv("DUB_API_KEY") for authentication. Do not run the program.

get-link.name: Retrieve a Dub link by ID
get-link.prompt: Using the Dub Go SDK (`github.com/dubinc/dub-go`), write a program in solution.go that retrieves an existing link's details by its link ID. Use the SDK's links get method. Install all dependencies first with go get. The DUB_API_KEY environment variable is already set — use os.Getenv("DUB_API_KEY") for authentication. Do not run the program.
